comments:
To recreate this issue profile with Either PI or TI and profile say a Eclipse Workbench. Launch the workbench and following the launch you will see the monitor up and showing the status as collecting data but the views will not contain any data. Profile to file does not succeed either.
The following is the stack Trace if you pipe the output to a file.
This is a regression from the previous driver. This test was on Win32.

Guru,

Please attach the trace that you are generating in that case to the defect, it might be a case were you need to send a value but it is null.
It seems that a required field is not set in the XML fragments.

That code was not changed since last year, so I don't have anything to roll back.

Marius,
  This is very interesting unless its a JVM issue I can pretty much reproduce it at will on a Multiprocessor machine on Win32/XP. I will investigate more and find whats missing.
